summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of WSSC Water Proposal Demo. All 16 features tested successfully with no issues found. Frontend-only React application working perfectly.
passed_tests: Hero section displays with gradient background and smooth scroll CTA to AI Features
Pain Points section shows two-column comparison with correct red/green borders (rgb(192,57,43) and rgb(26,174,111))
AI Features section displays all 6 feature cards with hover lift effects working
Chatbot Demo - All 4 quick question buttons trigger exact pre-programmed responses
Chatbot Demo - Typing indicator shows 3 bouncing dots animation correctly
Chatbot Demo - Custom message input with Enter key sends message and gets demo response
PWA Mockup section displays iPhone frame with Add to Home Screen overlay and all 4 benefits
Tech Stack section shows all 6 technology items with hover effects
ROI Calculator - All 4 inputs present with correct default values (10000, 5, 600000, 1.5)
ROI Calculator - Default calculation correct: $180,000 call savings + $225,000 bill savings = $405,000 total
ROI Calculator - Live updates working: Changed calls to 20000, correctly calculated $360,000 + $225,000 = $585,000
ROI Calculator - Animation on number updates working smoothly
Final CTA section with Schedule Demo Call button (mailto link) and Back to Top button
Back to Top button smooth scrolls to hero section correctly
Legal Footer shows exact disclaimer with Encore Services LLC branding and link
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Responsive design works perfectly on mobile viewport (390x844)
Smooth scroll navigation between all sections working
